标题: Dickies Men's Relaxed Straight Fit Lightweight Duck Carpenter Jean
详情: DURABLE STYLE: One of our most popular carpenter jeans. Soft garment-washed lightweight 100% cotton, deep front/back pockets, a utility pocket & left leg hammer loop. Relaxed fit gives room for bending, stooping & kneeling. Sits slightly below the waist.

标题: Dickies Men's Relaxed Straight Fit Lightweight Duck Carpenter Jean
详情: SUPERIOR CONSTRUCTION: These rugged jeans feature a classic 5 pocket styling that includes a coin pocket & signature stitching on the back pockets for the timeless Dickies look. The straight leg fits over boots.
